column5: i just got off the phone with navionics,in seattle washington and the new gold card is out now,and all the great lakes are on 1 card now,and lake nipissing is on the hot maps 07...so they did do upgrading as promised,so you can now get all of the great lakes...where before it was 3 seperate cards ..they have not added any new lakes in ontario,but they said they will sometime in the near future. its alwats confusing to figure it all out but if you go to  www.navionics.com you can see it for yourself...does anyone know how much   $178.00 american is converted to canadian    thanks       cheers
it converts to.... too damn much   just kidding, im sure it's worth it for some
Current exchange rate is about 1.18. US 178.00 would equate to about 210.04 Canadian.  Of course, I doubt you would get the full 1.18 on the dollar.
